casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert T. WALSTON, Sr. No. 392PA13-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 18, 2015. Mark Montgomery, for Walston, Robert T. (Sr.). Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. R. Andrew Womble, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of December 2015 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

*464"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of December 2015."
